categories.name: Change of Control
categories.description: Clauses addressing what happens if a party undergoes a change in ownership/control.

categories.name: Termination for Convenience
categories.description: Clauses allowing termination without cause, often with notice.

categories.name: Anti-Assignment
categories.description: Restrictions on assigning the agreement or transferring rights/obligations.

categories.name: Limitation of Liability
categories.description: Caps or limits on a party's liability.

categories.name: Governing Law
categories.description: Which jurisdiction's law governs the agreement.

categories.name: Non-Solicit
categories.description: Restrictions on soliciting or hiring the other party's employees/customers.

categories.name: Non-Compete
categories.description: Restrictions on competing activities during/after the agreement.

categories.name: Intellectual Property Ownership
categories.description: Who owns IP created/used under the agreement.
